mainBoard.flavorText: It's bad luck to step on one, but worse luck to have one step on you.

foreignData.name: Riesenmarienkäfer

Reichweite

foreignData.flavorText: Pisar una da mala suerte, pero peor suerte da que te pise una a ti.
foreignData.name: Mariquita gigante
foreignData.text:
Alcance.
Cuando la Mariquita gigante entre al campo de batalla, puedes buscar en tu biblioteca una carta de tierra básica, mostrarla, barajar y poner esa carta en la parte superior.

Portée

foreignData.text:

foreignData.name: Schwarmschlurfer
foreignData.text:
Der Schwarmschlurfer kommt mit einer +1/+1-Marke ins Spiel.
Immer wenn eine Kreatur, die du kontrollierst und auf der eine +1/+1-Marke liegt, das Ziel eines Zauberspruchs wird, den ein Gegner kontrolliert, erzeuge einen 1/1 grünen Insekt-Kreaturenspielstein.
{1}, {T}: Lege eine +1/+1-Marke auf den Schwarmschlurfer.

foreignData.name: Desollador enjambre
foreignData.text:
El Desollador enjambre entra al campo de batalla con un contador +1/+1 sobre él.
Siempre que una criatura que controlas con un contador +1/+1 sobre ella sea objetivo de un hechizo que controla un oponente, crea una ficha de criatura Insecto verde 1/1.
{1}, {T}: Pon un contador +1/+1 sobre el Desollador enjambre.

foreignData.name: Escogriffe de l'essaim
foreignData.text:

À chaque fois qu'une créature que vous contrôlez avec un marqueur +1/+1 sur elle devient la cible d'un sort qu'un adversaire contrôle, créez un jeton de créature 1/1 verte Insecte.
{1}, {T} : Mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur l'Escogriffe de l'essaim.

foreignData.name: Errante dello Sciame
foreignData.text:

Ogniqualvolta una creatura con un segnalino +1/+1 che controlli diventa il bersaglio di una magia controllata da un avversario, crea una pedina creatura Insetto 1/1 verde.

foreignData.name: 群れのシャンブラー
foreignData.text:
群れのシャンブラーは、＋１/＋１カウンター１個が置かれた状態で戦場に出る。

foreignData.name: 跛行菌兽
foreignData.text:
跛行菌兽进战场时上面有一个+1/+1指示物。
每当一个由你操控且其上有+1/+1指示物的生物成为由对手操控之咒语的目标时，派出一个1/1绿色昆虫衍生生物。
{1}，{T}：在跛行菌兽上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

mainBoard.name: Swarm Shambler
mainBoard.originalText:
Swarm Shambler enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it becomes the target of a spell an opponent controls, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token.
{1}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Swarm Shambler.

rulings.text: An ability that triggers when a creature becomes the target of a spell resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. It resolves even if that spell is countered.
If a creature without a +1/+1 counter on it becomes the target of a spell an opponent controls, putting a +1/+1 counter on it after that won’t cause Swarm Shambler’s middle ability to trigger.
If a spell targets a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it more than once, Swarm Shambler’s ability triggers only once.
You create just one Insect token, no matter how many +1/+1 counters the target creature has on it.

mainBoard.text:

mainBoard.name: Nessian Hornbeetle
mainBoard.originalText: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control another creature with power 4 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on Nessian Hornbeetle.

rulings.text: If you don’t control a creature with power 4 or greater as your combat phase begins, Nessian Hornbeetle’s ability doesn’t trigger. If you don’t control one as the ability resolves, it has no effect. It doesn’t have to be the same creature at both times, however.
Nessian Hornbeetle’s ability only gives it one +1/+1 counter, no matter how many creatures with power 4 or greater you control beyond the first.

mainBoard.name: Nantuko Cultivator
mainBoard.originalText: When Nantuko Cultivator enters the battlefield, you may discard any number of land cards. Put that many +1/+1 counters on Nantuko Cultivator and draw that many cards.

rulings.text: If an effect modifies how many +1/+1 counters you put on Nantuko Cultivator, the number of cards you draw isn't modified. Likewise, if an effect modifies how many cards you draw, the number of +1/+1 counters you put on Nantuko Cultivator won't be modified.
You discard, put counters, and draw all while Nantuko Cultivator's ability is resolving. Nothing can happen between the three, and no player may choose to take actions.

mainBoard.name: Iridescent Hornbeetle
mainBoard.originalText: At the beginning of your end step, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token for each +1/+1 counter you've put on creatures under your control this turn.

rulings.text: If Iridescent Hornbeetle leaves the battlefield before your end step, its ability won’t trigger at all. You won’t create any tokens.
If a creature enters the battlefield under your control with +1/+1 counters on it, Iridescent Hornbeetle’s ability counts those counters.

Iridescent Hornbeetle’s ability counts the number of +1/+1 counters you’ve put on your creatures, even if that happened before Iridescent Hornbeetle was on the battlefield, and even if those creatures are no longer on the battlefield or under your control (and, in some rare cases, even if those creatures aren’t creatures anymore).

mainBoard.name: Moldgraf Millipede

rulings.text: Moldgraf Millipede gets a +1/+1 counter for every creature card in your graveyard, including any creature cards that were already there before you milled three cards.

foreignData.text: あなたのライブラリーの一番上にあるカード４枚を公開する。あなたは、その中からクリーチャー・カード最大１枚と土地・カード最大１枚をあなたの手札に加えてもよい。残りをあなたの墓地に置く。

foreignData.flavorText: 凯利斯不急不躁，他一直暗中跟踪艾紫培的动向，直到宿命的交锋时刻。

mainBoard.name: Relentless Pursuit
mainBoard.originalText: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a creature card and/or a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

rulings.text: While resolving Relentless Pursuit, you could put no cards, a creature card, a land card, or a creature card and a land card into your hand.

mainBoard.text: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a creature card and/or a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

foreignData.flavorText: La caza acaba. Comienza la comida.

foreignData.flavorText: La chasse est terminée. Le repas est prêt.
foreignData.name: Avantage de la chasseresse

foreignData.flavorText: La caccia è finita. Inizia il pranzo.

foreignData.text: Metti un segnalino +1/+1 su una creatura bersaglio che controlli. Poi quella creatura infligge danno pari alla sua forza a una creatura bersaglio che non controlli.

foreignData.flavorText: 狩りが終わり、食事の時間になった。
foreignData.name: 狩人の刃
foreignData.text: あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャー１体と、あなたがコントロールしていないクリーチャー１体を対象とする。その前者の上に＋１/＋１カウンター１個を置く。その後、その前者はその後者に、自身のパワーに等しい点数のダメージを与える。

foreignData.flavorText: 狩猎结束，午餐开始。
foreignData.name: 猎者显威
foreignData.text: 在目标由你操控的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。然后该生物对目标不由你操控的生物造成伤害，其数量等同于前者的力量。

mainBoard.name: Hunter's Edge
mainBoard.originalText: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

rulings.text: If either creature is an illegal target as Hunter's Edge tries to resolve, the creature you control won't deal damage.
If the creature you don't control is an illegal target as Hunter's Edge tries to resolve but the creature you control is a legal target, you just put a +1/+1 counter on the creature you control.
You can't cast Hunter's Edge unless you choose both a creature you control and a creature you don't control as targets.

mainBoard.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

foreignData.name: Kribbeln
foreignData.text:
Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments kannst du zwei Karten millen. (Du kannst die obersten zwei Karten deiner Bibliothek auf deinen Friedhof legen.)
Immer wenn zum ersten Mal in einem Zug eine oder mehrere Länderkarten von irgendwoher auf deinen Friedhof gelegt werden, erzeuge einen 1/1 grünen Insekten-Kreaturenspielstein.

foreignData.name: Sensación hormigueante
foreignData.text:
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, puedes moler dos cartas. (Puedes poner las dos primeras cartas de tu biblioteca en tu cementerio.)
Siempre que una o más cartas de tierra vayan a tu cementerio desde cualquier parte por primera vez cada turno, crea una ficha de criatura Insecto verde 1/1.

foreignData.name: Sensation rampante
foreignData.text:
Au début de votre entretien, vous pouvez meuler deux cartes. (Vous pouvez mettre les deux cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque dans votre cimetière.)
À chaque fois qu'au moins une carte de terrain est mise dans votre cimetière d'où qu'elle vienne pour la première fois à chaque tour, créez un jeton de créature 1/1 verte Insecte.

foreignData.name: Sensazione Strisciante
foreignData.text:
All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, puoi macinare due carte. (Puoi mettere nel tuo cimitero le prime due carte del tuo grimorio.)
Ogniqualvolta una o più carte terra vengono messe nel tuo cimitero da qualsiasi zona per la prima volta in ogni turno, crea una pedina creatura Insetto 1/1 verde.

foreignData.name: 蟻走感
foreignData.text:
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたはカード２枚を切削してもよい。（あなたのライブラリーの一番にあるカード２枚をあなたの墓地に置いてもよい。）
各ターン内で初めて１枚以上の土地・カードがいずこかからあなたの墓地に置かれるたび、緑の１/１の昆虫・クリーチャー・トークン１体を生成する。

foreignData.name: 蠕爬异感
foreignData.text:
在你的维持开始时，你可以磨两张牌。（你可以将你牌库顶的两张牌置入你的坟墓场。）
每当每回合首度有一张或数张地牌从任何区域进入你的坟墓场时，派出一个1/1绿色昆虫衍生生物。

mainBoard.name: Crawling Sensation
mainBoard.originalText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may mill two cards. (You may put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)
Whenever one or more land cards are put into your graveyard from anywhere for the first time each turn, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token.

rulings.text: If multiple land cards are put into your graveyard at once, Crawling Sensation's last ability triggers only once. This could happen because an effect (such as that of Crawling Sensation's first ability) put them there from your library at once, or because they were destroyed at the same time (such as two land creatures that were dealt lethal combat damage).

mainBoard.text:
